Join the Journey of Music Evolution.
Listen to the Beat of Tomorrow.
Experience Music in a New Dimension.
Connect with Artists Like Never Before.
Join the Adventure of Music Discovery.

description.intro: To authorize in the Studio, please follow these steps:

confirm.title: Deleting a mood

sections.help: Did you know? You can press 1‚Äì9 on your keyboard to quickly jump between sections.

dicts.name: Metadata
dicts.subattention1: üéß Tell the truth ‚Äî it helps everyone!
dicts.subattention1_: When adding genres or moods, please select only those that truly describe your playlist
dicts.subattention2_: Tagging everything just to get visibility may harm your playlist's ranking and credibility. We monitor this behavior, and it could affect how your playlist is recommended or displayed
dicts.subattention3_: Accurate metadata helps listeners discover music they‚Äôll genuinely enjoy ‚Äî including yours. Honest tags = better matches = happier fans

title.name: Title *
title.subattention2: üí° Come up with a striking title that captures the vibe and genre of your playlist ‚Äî we‚Äôre not looking for the stock-library approach of keyword stuffing.

cover.name: Cover
cover.subattention1: üí° We will reject artwork that contains a website address (URL), X name, or any image that's pixelated, rotated, or poor quality
cover.subattention2: üí° We also reject artwork with prices or store logos (don't put an iTunes or Spotify logo on your artwork)
cover.subattention3: üí° You own this artwork and everything in it

is-editoral.name: Editorial Playlist
is-editoral.attention: Mark this if the playlist is editorial

sections.help: Did you know? You can press 1‚Äì9 on your keyboard to quickly jump between sections.

dicts.name: Metadata
dicts.subattention1: üéß Tell the truth ‚Äî it helps everyone!
dicts.subattention1_: When adding genres or moods, please select only those that truly describe your release
dicts.subattention2_: Tagging everything just to get visibility may harm your release's ranking and credibility. We monitor this behavior, and it could affect how your release is recommended or displayed
dicts.subattention3_: Accurate metadata helps listeners discover music they‚Äôll genuinely enjoy ‚Äî including yours. Honest tags = better matches = happier fans

title.name: Title *
title.attention: Just the title, no feat. artists or other info
title.subattention1: üí° Don't include featured artists here. Add them below, instead
title.subattention2: üí° If a cover release, don't include original artist's name
title.subattention3: üí° No year/dates. Do not include any year info (ex: 2025) in your release title

from-project.name: From Project
from-project.attention: Name of the movie, series, game, or project where this track appears

errors.has-confirmed: At least one contributor must be confirmed.
errors.role: Contributor #{id} must have a role assigned.
errors.unique-unregistered-artist-name: Duplicate unregistered artist name "{name}" with the same role "{role}".
errors.unique-artist: Artist with name "{name}" has a duplicate role "{role}".

artist-manual.title: Enter Artist Name
artist-manual.subattention1: Please use the artist's real or stage name as it appears on Spotify, Apple Music, or other platforms.
artist-manual.subattention2: Avoid nicknames or abbreviations. Use correct capitalization.
artist-manual.subattention3: This name is temporary ‚Äî you can link it to a registered artist later.

primary.name: Primary Artist
primary.attention: The main performer of the release; appears as the lead name

features.name: Featured Artist
features.attention: A guest performer credited alongside the main artist

producer.name: Producer
producer.attention: Responsible for the sound, arrangement, and overall production of the release

remixer.name: Remixer
remixer.attention: Reworked the original release to create a new version

composer.name: Composer
composer.attention: Wrote the music and/or lyrics for the release

mixer.name: Mixing Engineer
mixer.attention: Blended all audio elements into a final stereo version

mastering.name: Mastering Engineer
mastering.attention: Finalized the release's sound for distribution across platforms

lyricist.name: Lyricist
lyricist.attention: Writes the lyrics or words for the song

cover.name: Cover
cover.subattention1: üí° We will reject artwork that contains a website address (URL), X name, or any image that's pixelated, rotated, or poor quality
cover.subattention2: üí° We also reject artwork with prices or store logos (don't put an iTunes or Spotify logo on your artwork)
cover.subattention3: üí° You own this artwork and everything in it

ean.name: EAN / UPC Code
ean.attention: You can enter either an EAN or a UPC code
ean.subattention1: If you don't know what this means, just leave it blank

release-date.error: A track‚Äôs preorderDate cannot be later than its releaseDate
release-date.name: Release date

catalog-number.name: Catalog Number
catalog-number.attention: Optional identifier assigned by the label or distributor
catalog-number.subattention1: If you don't know what this means, just leave it blank

track-info.name: Track Info
track-info.help: Did you know? You can press Enter to create a track, or press Ctrl+Enter to create a track and add another one.

snippet.name: Snippet Preview
snippet.attention: Specify the time range for the track snippet
snippet.subattention1: Snippets must be between 15 and 30 seconds long

dicts.name: Metadata
dicts.subattention1: üéß Tell the truth ‚Äî it helps everyone!
dicts.subattention1_: When adding instruments, genres, moods, or tags, please select only those that truly describe your track
dicts.subattention2_: Tagging everything just to get visibility may harm your track's ranking and credibility. We monitor this behavior, and it could affect how your track is recommended or displayed
dicts.subattention3_: Accurate metadata helps listeners discover music they‚Äôll genuinely enjoy ‚Äî including yours. Honest tags = better matches = happier fans

title.name: Title *
title.attention: Just the title, no feat. artists or other info
title.subattention1: üí° Don't include featured artists here. Add them below, instead
title.subattention2: üí° If a cover song, don't include original artist's name
title.subattention3: üí° No year/dates. Do not include any year info (ex: 2025) in your song title

from-project.name: From Project
from-project.attention: Name of the movie, series, game, or project where this track appears

version.name: Version
version.attention: Leave empty for the original version. Use only for Remix, Live, Acoustic, etc.

errors.has-confirmed: At least one contributor must be confirmed.
errors.role: Contributor #{id} must have a role assigned.
errors.unique-unregistered-artist-name: Duplicate unregistered artist name "{name}" with the same role "{role}".
errors.unique-artist: Artist with name "{name}" has a duplicate role "{role}".

artist-manual.title: Enter Artist Name
artist-manual.subattention1: Please use the artist's real or stage name as it appears on Spotify, Apple Music, or other platforms.
artist-manual.subattention2: Avoid nicknames or abbreviations. Use correct capitalization.
artist-manual.subattention3: This name is temporary ‚Äî you can link it to a registered artist later.

primary.name: Primary Artist
primary.attention: The main performer of the track; appears as the lead name

features.name: Featured Artist
features.attention: A guest performer credited alongside the main artist

producer.name: Producer
producer.attention: Responsible for the sound, arrangement, and overall production of the track

remixer.name: Remixer
remixer.attention: Reworked the original track to create a new version

composer.name: Composer
composer.attention: Wrote the music and/or lyrics for the track

mixer.name: Mixing Engineer
mixer.attention: Blended all audio elements into a final stereo version

mastering.name: Mastering Engineer
mastering.attention: Finalized the track's sound for distribution across platforms

lyricist.name: Lyricist
lyricist.attention: Writes the lyrics or words for the song

cover.name: Cover
cover.subattention1: üí° We will reject artwork that contains a website address (URL), X name, or any image that's pixelated, rotated, or poor quality
cover.subattention2: üí° We also reject artwork with prices or store logos (don't put an iTunes or Spotify logo on your artwork)
cover.subattention3: üí° You own this artwork and everything in it

isrc.name: ISRC Code
isrc.subattention1: If you don't know what this means, just leave it blank

iswc.name: ISWC Code
iswc.subattention1: If you don't know what this means, just leave it blank

start.name: Start time
start.error: Please enter the snippet start time.

end.name: End time
end.error: Please enter the snippet end time.

snippet.error: Snippet length must be between 15 and 30 seconds.

content-id.name: Content ID
content-id.attention: Indicates whether this track is registered with YouTube Content ID. This helps with automatic copyright tracking and monetization on YouTube

has-pro-rights.name: Registered with PRO
has-pro-rights.attention: Check this if the track is registered with a Performance Rights Organization (PRO) such as ASCAP, BMI, or PRS. PROs collect royalties on behalf of artists

non-commercial-use.name: Allow Non-Commercial Use
non-commercial-use.attention: Enable this option if you allow others to download and use your track for free in non-commercial projects

is-explicit.name: Contains Explicit Content
is-explicit.attention: Check this if the track contains profanity, strong language, or other explicit material. This is required for parental advisory labeling

is-cover.name: Is a Cover
is-cover.attention: Check this if the track is a cover version of a previously released song
is-cover.subattention1: ‚úÖ This track is a cover of a song originally written and/or performed by another artist
is-cover.subattention2: ‚ö†Ô∏è By marking this track as a cover, you confirm that you have the necessary rights, licenses, or permissions to distribute this version
is-cover.subattention3: ‚ùå You are solely responsible for ensuring compliance with copyright laws and obtaining any required licenses (e.g., mechanical or sync licenses)
is-cover.subattention4: üö´ Bilbo is not liable for any copyright infringements related to this content. The responsibility lies entirely with the uploader

is-radio-edit.name: Radio Edit
is-radio-edit.attention: Mark this if the track is a radio-friendly version ‚Äî typically shortened and cleaned up for radio broadcast

instrumental.name: Instrumental
instrumental.attention: Check this if the track does not contain vocals and is not a vocal track with vocals removed

sound-quality.name: Sound Quality
sound-quality.attention: Represents the technical quality of the recording ‚Äî including mixing, mastering, and overall clarity

melody.name: Melody & Composition
melody.attention: Evaluates the musicality of the track ‚Äî including originality, structure, and how memorable the melody is

curator-score.name: Curator Score
curator-score.attention: A subjective score assigned by a curator based on the overall appeal and potential of the track

total.name: Total Score: {total}
total.attention: Used as an overall metric of the track's quality.
